channel.title: How do I add the Dragon Platebody to my server?
channel.description:
Well, I created these two items, Dragon Platebody and Dragon Plate (T), but I can not figure out how to add them into the game. One dude said that I would half to convert them into a java model file? Is that true?
[IMG]http://i8.tinypic.com/6yzlmpc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/6wvxb3o.png[/img]
How would I do this exactly? Afer all, it took me awhile to finally create this, and I most certainly want to add it to the server I am working on.
The only problem is, that I can not convert these .png files into a java model file.

item.title: How do I add the Dragon Platebody to my server?
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

this client and server side basicly you need to make a complete red plate and then make the plate go to the necklass spot and where the d chain as well

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add the Dragon Platebody to my server?

item.title: How do I add the Dragon Platebody to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Hinata_Dream Hinata Dream
item.description:
@Hinata_Dream wrote:

Oh sorry. For some reason I didn’t understand what you meant at first. Thank you!

Bug

Listen. When I started making this, all I had to work with was a White PlateBody and a dragon chain. I put the spikes and the dragon symbol on it, and BAM! After that, I had to carefully shade in with accurate and similar colors of the dragon chainbody, to form the Dragon Platebody.

Read full topic
